name: ScalaWAW
tagline: List of Scala companies in Warsaw
body:
# ScalaWAW

List of companies working in Scala, Akka in Warsaw

* [9LivesData](http://www.9livesdata.com/)
  * Storage R&D
  * ???
  * They are [hiring Scala developers](http://www.9livesdata.com/open-positions.html)
* [Allegro](http://allegro.pl/)
  * [@AllegroTechBlog](https://twitter.com/AllegroTechBlog)
  * Auction website (largest in Poland)
  * Use of Scala in Big Data analysis (Spark…)
  * They are [hiring](https://allegro.taleo.net/careersection/2/jobdetail.ftl?job=140238)
  * Offices in Śródmieście
* [Javeo](http://www.javeo.eu/)
  * ???
  * Offices in Mokotów
* [SoftwareMill](https://softwaremill.com/)
  * [@softwaremill](https://twitter.com/softwaremill)
  * Software house, Typesafe consulting partner
  * SoftwareMill is [hiring JVM (Java, Scala, Groovy) enginers](https://softwaremill.com/join-us/)
  * Fully remote
  * Also check out [Adam's blog](http://www.warski.org/blog/)
* [TouK](http://touk.pl/)
  * [@touk_pl](https://twitter.com/touk_pl)
  * Software house
  * ???
* [Viacom](http://www.vimn.pl/)
  * International media network
  * ???

Help us grow the list by forking and updating it!

It all started [with this Tweet](https://twitter.com/maciejb/status/488668728473956352).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
